lead_paragraph: President Obama criticized Republican lawmakers who, he said, were trying to prevent the United States and Iran from finalizing a nuclear weapons agreement.

headline.print_headline: Obama Denounces Attempts to Derail Nuclear Deal
headline.main: Obama Denounces Attempts to Derail Nuclear Deal With Iran

snippet: President Obama criticized Republican lawmakers who, he said, were trying to prevent the United States and Iran from finalizing a nuclear weapons agreement.
abstract: Pres Obama fiercely defends proposed nuclear deal with Iran and criticizes Republican lawmakers who, he says, are trying to derail its completion.
